2230  if (!quest)
2231  continue;

590  if (isDungeon)
591  {
592  joinData.result = LFG_JOIN_MIXED_RAID_DUNGEON;
593  }
594  isRaid = true;
595  break;
596  default:
597  LOG_ERROR("lfg", "Wrong dungeon type %u for dungeon %u", type, *it);
598  joinData.result = LFG_JOIN_DUNGEON_INVALID;
599  break;
600  }
601  }
602  }
603 
604  if (!isRaid && joinData.result == LFG_JOIN_OK)
605  {
606  // Check player or group member restrictions
607  if (player->InBattleground() || player->InArena() || player->InBattlegroundQueue())
608  joinData.result = LFG_JOIN_USING_BG_SYSTEM;
609  else if (player->HasAura(LFG_SPELL_DUNGEON_DESERTER))
610  joinData.result = LFG_JOIN_DESERTER;
611  else if (dungeons.empty())
612  joinData.result = LFG_JOIN_NOT_MEET_REQS;
613  else if (grp)
614  {
615  if (grp->GetMembersCount() > MAXGROUPSIZE)
616  joinData.result = LFG_JOIN_TOO_MUCH_MEMBERS;
617  else
618  {
619  uint8 memberCount = 0;
620  for (GroupReference* itr = grp->GetFirstMember(); itr != nullptr && joinData.result == LFG_JOIN_OK; itr = itr->next())
621  {
622  if (Player* plrg = itr->GetSource())
623  {
624  if (plrg->HasAura(LFG_SPELL_DUNGEON_DESERTER))
625  joinData.result = LFG_JOIN_PARTY_DESERTER;
626  else if (plrg->InBattleground() || plrg->InArena() || plrg->InBattlegroundQueue())
627  joinData.result = LFG_JOIN_USING_BG_SYSTEM;
628  ++memberCount;
629  players.insert(plrg->GetGUID());
630  }
631  }
632 
633  if (joinData.result == LFG_JOIN_OK && memberCount != grp->GetMembersCount())
634  joinData.result = LFG_JOIN_DISCONNECTED;
635  }
636  }
637  else
638  players.insert(player->GetGUID());
639 
640  // Xinef: Check dungeon cooldown only for random dungeons
641  // Xinef: Moreover check this only if dungeon is not started, afterwards its obvious that players will have the cooldown
642  if (joinData.result == LFG_JOIN_OK && !isContinue && rDungeonId)
643  {
644  if (player->HasAura(LFG_SPELL_DUNGEON_COOLDOWN)) // xinef: added !isContinue
645  joinData.result = LFG_JOIN_RANDOM_COOLDOWN;
646  else if (grp)
647  {
648  for (GroupReference* itr = grp->GetFirstMember(); itr != nullptr && joinData.result == LFG_JOIN_OK; itr = itr->next())
649  if (Player* plrg = itr->GetSource())
650  if (plrg->HasAura(LFG_SPELL_DUNGEON_COOLDOWN)) // xinef: added !isContinue
651  joinData.result = LFG_JOIN_PARTY_RANDOM_COOLDOWN;
652  }
653  }
654  }
655 
656  if (isRaid)
657  players.insert(player->GetGUID());
658 
659  if (joinData.result == LFG_JOIN_OK)
660  {
661  // Expand random dungeons and check restrictions
662  if (rDungeonId)
663  dungeons = GetDungeonsByRandom(rDungeonId);
664 
665  // if we have lockmap then there are no compatible dungeons
666  // xinef: dont check compatibile dungeons for already running group (bind problems)
667  if (!isContinue)
668  {
669  GetCompatibleDungeons(dungeons, players, joinData.lockmap);
670  if (dungeons.empty())
671  joinData.result = grp ? LFG_JOIN_PARTY_NOT_MEET_REQS : LFG_JOIN_NOT_MEET_REQS;
672  }
673  }
674 
675  // pussywizard:
676  if (isRaid && grp && (grp->isLFGGroup() || guid != grp->GetLeaderGUID()))
677  return;
678 
679  // Do not allow to change dungeon in the middle of a current dungeon
680  if (!isRaid && isContinue && grp->GetMembersCount() == 5)
681  {
682  dungeons.clear();
683  dungeons.insert(GetDungeon(gguid));
684  joinData.result = LFG_JOIN_PARTY_NOT_MEET_REQS;
685  }
686 
687  // Can't join. Send result
688  if (joinData.result != LFG_JOIN_OK)
689  {
690  LOG_DEBUG("lfg", "LFGMgr::Join: [%s] joining with %u members. result: %u", guid.ToString().c_str(), grp ? grp->GetMembersCount() : 1, joinData.result);
691  if (!dungeons.empty()) // Only should show lockmap when have no dungeons available
692  joinData.lockmap.clear();
693  player->GetSession()->SendLfgJoinResult(joinData);
694  return;
695  }
696 
697  SetComment(guid, comment);
698 
699  if (isRaid)
700  {
701  if (grp)
702  roles = PLAYER_ROLE_LEADER;
703  else
704  roles &= (PLAYER_ROLE_TANK | PLAYER_ROLE_HEALER | PLAYER_ROLE_DAMAGE);
705  if (!roles)
706  return;
707  JoinRaidBrowser(player, roles, dungeons, comment);
708  SetState(guid, LFG_STATE_RAIDBROWSER);
709  SendRaidBrowserJoinedPacket(player, dungeons, comment);
710  return;
711  }
712 
713  std::string debugNames = "";
714  if (grp) // Begin rolecheck
715  {
716  // Create new rolecheck
717  LfgRoleCheck& roleCheck = RoleChecksStore[gguid];
718  roleCheck.roles.clear(); // pussywizard: NEW rolecheck, not old one with trash data >_>
719  roleCheck.cancelTime = time_t(time(nullptr)) + LFG_TIME_ROLECHECK;
720  roleCheck.state = LFG_ROLECHECK_INITIALITING;
721  roleCheck.leader = guid;
722  roleCheck.dungeons = dungeons;
723  roleCheck.rDungeonId = rDungeonId;
724 
725  if (rDungeonId)
726  {
727  dungeons.clear();
728  dungeons.insert(rDungeonId);
729  }
730 
731  SetState(gguid, LFG_STATE_ROLECHECK);
732  // Send update to player
733  LfgUpdateData updateData = LfgUpdateData(LFG_UPDATETYPE_JOIN_QUEUE, dungeons, comment);
734  for (GroupReference* itr = grp->GetFirstMember(); itr != nullptr; itr = itr->next())
735  {
736  if (Player* plrg = itr->GetSource())
737  {
738  ObjectGuid pguid = plrg->GetGUID();
739  plrg->GetSession()->SendLfgUpdateParty(updateData);
740  SetState(pguid, LFG_STATE_ROLECHECK);
741  if (!isContinue)
742  SetSelectedDungeons(pguid, dungeons);
743  roleCheck.roles[pguid] = 0;
744  if (!debugNames.empty())
745  debugNames.append(", ");
746  debugNames.append(plrg->GetName());
747  }
748  }
749  // Update leader role
750  UpdateRoleCheck(gguid, guid, roles);
751  }
752  else // Add player to queue
753  {
754  LfgRolesMap rolesMap;
755  rolesMap[guid] = roles;
756  LFGQueue& queue = GetQueue(guid);
757  queue.AddQueueData(guid, time(nullptr), dungeons, rolesMap);
758 
759  if (!isContinue)
760  {
761  if (rDungeonId)
762  {
763  dungeons.clear();
764  dungeons.insert(rDungeonId);
765  }
766  SetSelectedDungeons(guid, dungeons);
767  }
768  // Send update to player
769  player->GetSession()->SendLfgJoinResult(joinData);
770  player->GetSession()->SendLfgUpdatePlayer(LfgUpdateData(LFG_UPDATETYPE_JOIN_QUEUE, dungeons, comment));
771  SetState(guid, LFG_STATE_QUEUED);
772  SetRoles(guid, roles);
773  debugNames.append(player->GetName());
774  }
775 
776  /*if (sLog->ShouldLog(LOG_FILTER_LFG, LOG_LEVEL_DEBUG))
777  {
778  std::ostringstream o;
779  o << "LFGMgr::Join: [" << guid << "] joined (" << (grp ? "group" : "player") << ") Members: " << debugNames.c_str()
780  << ". Dungeons (" << uint32(dungeons.size()) << "): " << ConcatenateDungeons(dungeons);

Leaves lfg.

Leaves Dungeon System. Player/Group is removed from queue, rolechecks, proposals or votekicks. Player or group needs to be not nullptr and using Dungeon System

Parameters
